Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the words "In God We Trust" are gone from the new dollar coins, when in fact they have been moved from the edge to the front of the coin.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a chain email that has been debunked by fact-checking websites.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the absence of the words "In God We Trust" on the edge of the coin means they are completely gone from the new dollar coins, which is not accurate.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider the alternative explanation that the words have been relocated from the edge to the front of the coin.
